column4: hey, I'm doing a amd64 PXE install and I get an error about a corrupted Package file
I googled it and touching it makes the installer not complain
my question is, should I support a bug report?
what does touching do ?
how does it effect the file ?
right, so touching that file won't change it's size
it won't fill it with the correct data
what do you mean it shouldn't be there ?
sorry, could you explain that again please, I'm not following
ok - first things first, where did you get this CD ?
which CD are you using, the netboot ?
the amd64 netboot for oneiric
ok
so thats the mini.iso (just to confirm the file)
no the tar.gz, sorry
no problem, that's why I'm clarifying
but the file I fixed in ubuntu-11.10-server-amd64.is
ok - so I'm looking at that directory structure now, what file is zero length
/dists/oneric/restricted/binary-amd64/Packages.gz unzips to zero lenght
that file system is not in the tar file
no I know, sorry! The iso with the file is ubuntu-11.10-server-amd64.iso
the netboot works fine you got me confused
sorry, I've lost interest now,
